name: Zombie Chase - Run Away 3D
description:
The world is infected - zombie apocalypse happens again. You are one of a few, who survived, and now your goal is to fight with angry zombies. Meet Zombie Chase - Run Away 3D – addictive sniper shooter in the genre of zombie-apocalypse.

HOW TO PLAY: Zombies draw closer like a tsunami, and your goal is to avoid percussion. You can find some weapon and shoot zombies. Try to survive!

Zombie Chase - Run Away 3D game features:
• Cool zombie shooter in 3D;
• Post apocalypse atmosphere;
• Zombie survival simulator;
• Really high speed – check your reaction;
• Horror graphics and sounds;
• Maybe the best zombie runner.

Become a zombie hunter - it's you only chance to survive the zombies! We wish you good luck in Zombie Chase - Run Away 3D game!
